Fwd: MCC COs
From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
To Lee Plourde
Date 2019/11/19 07:32
Subject: Fwd: MCC COs
Attachments: TEXT.htm
> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @ep.org> 11/18/2019 4:57 PM >>>
Good afternoon! We understood two employees of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan are about to be charged re: lapses the night of Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Are you representing either of them in the criminal matter? If not, who is? We'd like to reach out of fairness and to ensure we are separating fact from rumors.
Any guidance/point in the right direction would be most appreciated.
Best (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
--
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Associated Press

> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @ep.org> 11/18/2019 4:57 PM >>>
Good afternoon! We understood two employees of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan are about to be charged re: lapses the night of Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Are you representing either of them in the criminal matter? If not, who is? We'd like to reach out of fairness and to ensure we are separating fact from rumors.
Any guidance/point in the right direction would be most appreciated.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions of personal information marked as (b)(6), (b)(7)(C). The email is a forwarded message discussing potential charges against employees of the Metropolitan Correctional Center related to Jeffrey Epstein's death.
